column4: how do i move round my system in terminal can some one give me a few commands to try please
i want to get in downloads
'cd somedirectory' to go to somedirectory. 'ls' and 'ls -l' to list files. ('ls -a' and 'ls -la' show hidden ones too.)
First, $HOME is not /home. It is /home/lavin. (Assuming your Ubuntu username is 'lavin'.)
